post.body: Is that supposed to be an insult? I ask cuz the alliteration makes it pretty damn endearing!
I dunno how this works. Why is some dame I don't know "following me" after I've been on this for a day? Spamette?
This will come in handy when you're tempted to get Blownapart Bastards back together @ 3am...
Too sick to taste my diabolical soy chicken croquettes, and my washing machine just broke... Atheism, don't fail me now!
Dec 26th back to work sched: 45% waffle iron exch. shopping, 30% tea breaks, 20% old man neck exercises, 3% ignoring facebook apps, 2% t ...
I miss north Jersey. It's been 3 years, and this Philly accent is still a cringer.
Do I have time to cut my own hair, chower, and finish this overly-Silk'd coffee in 30 min? (This coffee = soy tar. Subtract that.)
Sweet Enola Gay, son! Tofurky is comin outta my EYES.
PA got 99 problems, but McCain ain't one.
Pretty much rode the train with bizarro Dr. Melfi's psychiatrist, Elliot. Like Larry King, but less turtle-y.
This research class says nothing to me about my life.
Train platform weirdo of note # 2- dude wearing choking incense cologne...like a thousand sticks burning in a phone booth from 100 ft. away.
This 50ish white collar dude on the train platform next to me is eating oatmeal & an entire(?) cantelope out of a Visions Cookwear saucepan.
Trying to consume more than coffee in the morn = coffee, bananas, protein pow., soy milk... Now I'm all wired 'n gloopy.
... having a rough time working on this annotated bibliography... pretending it's a class/anti-academia issue... whatever it takes
